description: Automatic demo registration based on folder and filename convention
context:
Beads description:
Demos should be auto-registered based on folder structure and filename conventions. Structure: docs/<route>/##-<name>.svelte where ## is the display order index and <name> becomes the section title. For example, docs/elements/01-Carousel.svelte would appear first on /elements route with title 'Carousel'. The route page would dynamically load all demos from its corresponding docs folder, ordered by the numeric prefix, eliminating manual imports and CodeExample registration.
